00022 /**
00023  * @file   GcAdjust.cpp
00024  * @author Chuck Sugnet
00025  * @date   Mon Oct 24 09:47:42 2005
00026  * 
00027  * @brief Class for doing an adjustment based on the median intensity of probes
00028  * with similar GC content.
00029  */
00030 
00031 //
00032 #include "chipstream/GcAdjust.h"
00033 //
00034 #include "chipstream/ChipLayout.h"
00035 #include "chipstream/QuantMethod.h"
00036 //
00037 #include "stats/stats.h"
00038 #include "util/Err.h"
00039 #include "util/Verbose.h"
00040 #include "util/md5sum.h"
00041 //

00043 using namespace std;
00044 using namespace affx;
00045 
00046 /** 
00047  * @brief Constructor taking information about both the chip and
00048  * probes to be used for estimating parameters.
00049  * 
00050  * @param layout - Annotation of probes on microarray.
00051  * @param controlProbes - Probes to be used for estimating parameters.
00052  */
00053 void GcAdjust::setLayout(ChipLayout &layout, vector<Probe *> &controlProbes) {
00054   m_Probes.resize(controlProbes.size());
00055   /* Calculate md5 sum of probe ids. */
00056   md5sum md5;
00057   for(int bgIx = 0; bgIx != controlProbes.size(); ++bgIx) {
00058     //md5.update(&(*bgIx)->id, sizeof((*bgIx)->id));
00059     md5.update_nbo(controlProbes[bgIx]->id);
00060     m_Probes[bgIx] = controlProbes[bgIx]->id;
00061   }
00062   md5.final(m_ProbeMd5Sum);
00063   setOptValue("subsetmd5", m_ProbeMd5Sum);
00064 
00065   /* Remember that haven't filled the bins yet. */
00066   m_BinsFilled = false;
00067   /* Get map of probe to probe id to gc content. */
00068   m_ProbeGcVec = layout.getGcProbeVec();
00069 }
00070 
00071 /** 
00072  * @brief Constructor taking information about both the chip and
00073  * probes to be used for estimating parameters.
00074  * 
00075  * @param board - Blackboard containing lots of state.
00076  */
00077 void GcAdjust::setParameters(PsBoard &board) {
00078   DataStore *info = board.getProbeInfo();
00079   info->getGcControlProbes(m_Probes);
00080   info->getProbeGc(m_ProbeGcVec);
00081 
00082   /* Calculate md5 sum of probe ids. */
00083   md5sum md5;
00084   for(int bgIx = 0; bgIx != m_Probes.size(); ++bgIx) {
00085     md5.update_nbo(m_Probes[bgIx]);
00086   }
00087   md5.final(m_ProbeMd5Sum);
00088   setOptValue("subsetmd5", m_ProbeMd5Sum);
00089 
00090   /* Remember that haven't filled the bins yet. */
00091   m_BinsFilled = false;
00092 }
00093 
00094 /** 
00095  * @brief Set the probes necessary for estimating GC background to
00096  * true so they will be loaded.
00097  * 
00098  * @param probes - bitmask for probe to be loaded.
00099  */
00100 void GcAdjust::setProbes(vector<bool> &probes) {
00101   md5sum md5;
00102   unsigned int i = 0;
00103   for(i = 0; i < m_Probes.size(); i++) {
00104     md5.update_nbo(m_Probes[i]);
00105     probes[m_Probes[i]] = true;
00106   }
00107   md5.final(m_ProbeMd5Sum);
00108 }
00109 
00110 /** 
00111  * @brief Fill in the GC bins using the raw data in intensity mart
00112  * and processed by iTrans ChipStream.
00113  * 
00114  * @param chipIx - Index of chip to be filled in.
00115  * @param iMart - Raw data to be used.
00116  * @param iTrans - Chipstreams that will be used to transform the raw data.
00117    */
00118 void GcAdjust::fillChipBins(int chipIx, const IntensityMart &iMart, std::vector<ChipStream *> &iTrans) {
00119   assert(chipIx >= 0 && chipIx < iMart.getCelDataSetCount());
00120   unsigned int probeIx = 0, binIx = 0;
00121   int pIx = -1;
00122   unsigned int binCount = m_Bins[chipIx].size();
00123   vector<vector<float> > gcBins;
00124 
00125   for(binIx = 0; binIx < binCount; binIx++) {
00126     gcBins.push_back(vector<float>());
00127   }
00128 
00129   // Fill in the bins with raw data processed by chip streams.
00130   for(probeIx = 0; probeIx < m_Probes.size(); probeIx++) {
00131     float intensity = 0;
00132     unsigned int bin = 0;
00133     pIx = m_Probes[probeIx];
00134     if(m_ProbeGcVec[pIx] == (char)NULLPROBEGC)
00135       Err::errAbort("GcAdjust - Need probe index: " + ToStr(pIx) + " GC count for background, but wasn't loaded.");
00136     bin = m_ProbeGcVec[pIx];
00137     ///@todo iterate over each channel
00138     intensity = QuantMethod::transformPrimaryData(pIx, chipIx, iMart, iTrans);
00139     gcBins[bin].push_back(intensity);
00140   }
00141   
00142   // Estimate the medians for each bin.
00143   for(binIx = 0; binIx < gcBins.size(); binIx++) {
00144     float med =  -1.0;
00145     if(gcBins[binIx].empty()) {
00146       if(chipIx == 0)
00147         Verbose::out(2, "Warning: GC Bin " + ToStr(binIx) + " has no data.");
00148     }
00149     else
00150       med = median_in_place(gcBins[binIx].begin(), gcBins[binIx].end());
00151     m_Bins[chipIx][binIx] = med;
00152   }
00153 }
00154 
00155 /** 
00156  * @brief Calculate the parameters for each GC count.
00157  * 
00158  * @param iMart - Raw data from chips.
00159  * @param iTrans - Transformations to apply to data.
00160  */
00161 void GcAdjust::calcParams(const IntensityMart &iMart, std::vector<ChipStream *> &iTrans) {
00162   int chipIx = 0;
00163   int binCount = m_MaxGc;
00164   int chipCount = iMart.getCelDataSetCount();
00165   assert(chipCount > 0);
00166   assert(binCount > 0);
00167   if(m_Probes.empty()) {
00168     Err::errAbort("GcAdjust::calcParams() - Doesn't look like setLayout() has been called, no control probes.");
00169   }
00170 
00171   /* Make the correct size of bin matrix. */
00172   m_Bins.resize(chipCount);
00173   for(chipIx = 0; chipIx < chipCount; chipIx++) 
00174     m_Bins[chipIx].resize(binCount);
00175   
00176   for(chipIx = 0; chipIx < chipCount; chipIx++) 
00177     fillChipBins(chipIx, iMart, iTrans);
00178 }
00179

00181 /** 
00182  * @brief Function to determine how much to adjust a perfect match intensity.
00183  * @param probeIx - Index of probe in cel file data.
00184  * @param chipIx - Microarray or chip index.
00185  * @param iMart - IntensityMart which holds raw data.
00186  * @param iTrans - Vector of transformations that should be performed on raw data.
00187  * @param pmIintensity - Intensity of perfect match probe to be adjusted, may
00188  * be modified from original value depending on adjuster
00189  * @param bgrdAdjust - Background adjustment, if any, recommended (i.e. MM intensity)
00190  */
00191 void GcAdjust::pmAdjustment(int probeIx, 
00192                             int chipIx, 
00193                             const IntensityMart &iMart, 
00194                             std::vector<ChipStream *> &iTrans, 
00195                             float &pmIntensity, 
00196                             float &bgrdAdjust)
00197 {
00198   int gcBin = 0;
00199 
00200   // If we haven't calculated parameters yet, do it now.
00201   if(!m_BinsFilled) {
00202     calcParams(iMart, iTrans);
00203     m_BinsFilled = true;
00204   }
00205 
00206   // Look up probe gc count.
00207   if(m_ProbeGcVec[probeIx] == (char)NULLPROBEGC) 
00208     Err::errAbort("Unable to figure out GC count for probe with id: " + ToStr(probeIx + 1));
00209   gcBin = m_ProbeGcVec[probeIx];
00210   if(gcBin < 0 || gcBin >= m_MaxGc)
00211     Err::errAbort("GC count out of accepted range for probe with id: " + ToStr(probeIx + 1));
00212   if(m_Bins[chipIx][gcBin] < 0.0) 
00213     //Err::errAbort("No background probe correction available for GC count " + ToStr(gcBin) + ". Failed on GC correction of probe with id: " + ToStr(probeIx + 1));
00214         bgrdAdjust = 0.0f;
00215 
00216   else // Return the pre calculated median for GC count.
00217     bgrdAdjust = m_Bins[chipIx][gcBin];
00218 }
